use oxemarine_ldw
GO

/*
if object_id('silver.device') IS NOT NULL DROP EXTERNAL TABLE silver.device
GO
-- cant delete file here in sql

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.device
WITH (
    DATA_SOURCE = oxemarine_src,
    LOCATION = 'silver/device',
    FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
)
AS 
SELECT *
    FROM bronze.vw_device
;

select top 1000 * from silver.device
*/

EXEC silver.usp_silver_device 'D994BF29','2022','12','27'
